<bo>.name: bo
<bo>.info: <bo> is a well-groomed, medium-sized Shiba Inu with a thick, cinnamon-colored coat, cream accents, alert eyes, and a black collar.

<brown-duck>.name: brown-duck
<brown-duck>.info: <brown-duck> is a brown, plush duck toy with a green head, an yellow beak and feet, and a white stripe around its neck.

<butin>.name: butin
<butin>.info: <butin> is a husky, lying on its back with its paws in the air and its eyes closed. The husky has a white and brown coat.

<cat-cup>.name: cat-cup
<cat-cup>.info: <cat-cup> is a white ceramic mug with a cat face design. The mug has a handle on the side.

<chua-thien-mu>.name: chua-thien-mu
<chua-thien-mu>.info: <chua-thien-mu> is a tall, octagonal pagoda with a pointed roof. The pagoda is made of gray and red stone and has a series of windows and decorative elements.

<ciin>.name: ciin
<ciin>.info: <ciin> is a young woman with long blonde hair, wearing a white sleeveless shirt. She has bright red lipstick and light makeup.

<denisdang>.name: denisdang
<denisdang>.info: <denisdang> is a man with white hair and a pink and grey sweater.

<dragon>.name: dragon
<dragon>.info: <dragon> is a pink and yellow plush toy in the shape of a dragon. It has a blue wing and yellow spots on its body.

<duck-banana>.name: duck-banana
<duck-banana>.info: <duck-banana> is a large, white, plush toy shaped like a duck with an orange beak, feet, and a yellow chest.

<dug>.name: dug
<dug>.info: <dug> is a golden retriever from the movie Up. He has a brown coat and a big, goofy smile, wearing a collar with some round objects.

<messi>.name: messi
<messi>.info: <messi> is an Argentine professional footballer widely considered one of the greatest players of all time. He has won numerous awards, including multiple Ballon d'Or trophies.

<neymar>.name: neymar.
<neymar>.info: <neymar>, also known as Neymar da Silva Santos Júnior, is a Brazilian professional footballer known for his speed, dribbling, and flair. He has played for top clubs like Barcelona and Paris Saint-Germain.

<sualez>.name: sualez
<sualez>.info: <sualez> is a Uruguayan professional footballer known for his goal-scoring ability and controversial moments on the field. He has played for clubs like Barcelona and Atlético Madrid.

<hinton>.name: Geoffrey Hinton
<hinton>.info: Geoffrey Hinton is a pioneering researcher in the field of artificial intelligence and deep learning. Known as one of the 'godfathers of AI', his work on neural networks and backpropagation revolutionized the field.

<lecun>.name: Yann LeCun
<lecun>.info: Yann LeCun is a computer scientist known for his contributions to machine learning and deep learning, particularly convolutional neural networks (CNNs). He is also one of the 'godfathers of AI'.

<bengio>.name: Yoshua Bengio
<bengio>.info: Yoshua Bengio is a deep learning researcher and one of the pioneers of artificial intelligence. His work on neural networks, particularly deep learning algorithms, has been instrumental in the advancement of the field.

<man>.name: Big Man
<man>.info: Big Man is a greedy Indian guy who enjoys collecting rubbish!

<bb>.name: Bob
<bb>.info: Bob is a romantic old man.

<gg>.name: GaGa
<gg>.info: GaGa is a highschool girl enjoying playing sports.
